Top Belgian athletes: 'it is organized in your honor, to thank you for the wonderful image you give of our country'
'Hulde vandaag is uiteraard ook gericht aan jullie collega's die er vandaag niet bij konden zijn omwille van sportieve verplichtingen'
'Beyond your magnificent performances, I want to thank you for the great moments of emotion that you make us live'
'We hebben jullie zien schitteren; eleven hockey-, volleybal- in basketbalploegen, maar ook eleven zwemmers, wielrenners, atleten ... '
'Nos #DiablesRouges are only the most exposed part of an extraordinarily diversified and powerful Belgian sports world'
Some are showing even more courage and determination. I think of Paralympic athletes and Special Olympics'
'I would like to express to you my gratitude for all those who make sport live in #Belgium'
'Ik wil iedereen die zich inzet voor Belgische sport, op en naast tracks in velden, van harte bedanken voor hun inzet in enthusiasm'

I chaired a meeting of the Council of Ministers today, during which we decided to establish an Emirates Board for medical specialties.
The government takes seriously all the proposals of the field and the public .. Development and development is a joint process between the government and society .. The one hand does not applaud ..
Today, we also decided to form boards of directors of the Emirates and Zayed universities. We have directed everyone to work to raise the ranking of our national universities globally.
Our goal is that our national universities with their cadres, students, research and studies will support the government in its work and a key tool in implementing our vision for our future.
Today we also decided to issue a comprehensive law on food safety in the country. We want to raise the quality of food to the highest possible level. Food is the secret in the health of society
Today, we also decided to introduce the Government Procurement Manual to enhance transparency and control, as well as the GCC-US Trade Agreement
We also agreed today to increase our contribution to the Arab Fund for Economic and Social Development and the Arab Organization for Agricultural Investment and Development
We are in Manisa to realize our first meeting today on the way to New Turkey. # NewTurkeyIndustryManisa http://t.co/ENtdENcVR1
Chaired a cabinet meeting during which we approved to establish The UAE Board of Medical Specialties. http://t.co/y32I3NbWg9
The board's idea is a suggestion from the people in the UAE. It was made during a national brainstorm session we had earlier in 2013
We take the public's suggestions seriously. The government and the community are partners in the development process.
We also approved forming boards of directors for UAE & Zayed universities & requested improving our national universities' global rankings
We want our national universities to be main supporters for the govt. in its vision and mission. We want them to be a major executive force
We also approved issuing a general law concerning food safety. We want the highest quality standards for food in the UAE.
The trade and investment agreement signed between the GCC and the US has also been approved during our meeting today
We also approved increasing our capital contribution to The Arab Fund & the Arab Authority for Agricultural Investment And Development.
